reference.title: Archaic Weapons
reference.shortdesc: Archaic weapons refer to melee weapons and non-firearms that are out-of-use in the modern era.

row.entry: Numerical requirement for Strength to use the weapon.
How many hands it requires to wield the weapon.
The amount of money in gold pieces it requires to buy the weapon.
How much fatigue it costs to use the weapon in combat.
How much damage the weapon deals when it hits someone.
A multiplier for the damage if the character gets an incredible hit.
The type of weapon: B=Blunt, S=Sharp.
Armor Piercing, how much damage reduction the weapon ignores on target.
The maximum range of the weapon, it is harder to use beyond this range.
